features: ✔️【Full HD 1080P Webcam】-High-definition 1080P webcam. Stream and record vibrant, true-to-life HD 1080p video captures the most exciting details, and picture quality is realistic and pure. Delivers sharp, smooth video for chats or recording. Wide 75 degree Angle View, no optical distortion. Great for webinars, and video conferencing.

🔒【Webcam Cover】-With Privacy Shutter, you can control what you show and protects the lens, and prevents web hackers from Spying on you. It is perfect to provide privacy, security and peace of mind to individuals, groups, organizations, companies etc.

🔊【Webcam with Analog Microphone】-Built-in dual noise reducing analog microphones, superior stereo audio, which allow clear and natural sound recording. It is the best choice of video conference to output sound clearly in noisy environment.

🔔【Versatile Compatibility USB Webcam】-Usb 2.0 connector. Fits for multi-operations: Windows, Mac OS and Android etc. Platform Compatibility Skype, Youtube, Yahoo!@Messenger, MSN, Zoom, Windows Live@Messager, Gmail, Android IPTV, WeChat etc instant messaging applications.

⚙️【Plug and Play & Flexible Placement】-Universal plug and play, Easy to Use. With a mounting clip and a tripod thread, you can connect it to just about anything you can think of. Whether that be on an LED monitor, notebook lid, table or counter top.
body.description: Dericam Makes You Enjoy Happy Online Chat Time Widescreen HD 1080p video calls Experience sharp, smooth video calling (1080p/30fps) in a widescreen format on your favourite platforms like Skype. At 30 frames per second, video quality is smooth and lag-free, while images are crisp, colourful and contrasted. For Online Chating, Gaming and Streaming Live Designed for streaming gaming live at most of game platform and social media like Facebook, Skype, Messenger, Hangouts, Youtube and so on. Suitable for video recording, video conferencing, live streaming, professional meetings, and coaching.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dericam Makes You Enjoy Happy Online Chat Time Widescreen HD 1080p video calls Experience sharp, smooth video calling (1080p/30fps) in a widescreen format on your favourite platforms like Skype. At 30 frames per second, video quality is smooth and lag-free, while images are crisp, colourful and contrasted. For Online Chating, Gaming and Streaming Live Designed for streaming gaming live at most of game platform and social media like Facebook, Skype, Messenger, Hangouts, Youtube and so on. Suitable for video recording, video conferencing, live streaming, professional meetings, and coaching. Highlights: High-Def Video Calls Built-in Noise-Reducing microphone USB Plug and Play HDR (High Dynamic Range) Automatic Low-light Correction

PROTECTS YOUR DIGITAL PRIVACY Protect Your Privacy! Webcam camera hacking is widespread. The only way to protect your privacy is to cover the camera when you are not using it. Dericam HD Webcam is designed for people who like to have more privacy, security and peace of mind ! Easy to install and use You can easily tear off the back sticker; then attach it to your webcam; Press webcan cover firmly in place and hold for about 12 seconds for a strong but non-permanent seal. Warm tips: Clean our webcam with the cloth included before sticking the webcam cover.

Built-in Noise-Reducing Microphone Attention! This is an analog microphone! Built-in sound absorption microphone, your voice is heard clearly in 30 feet, which means you do not have to come near to kiss your camera awkwardly. Quick and Easy Set-Up Get ready right away without having to worry about installing drivers. Easily connect this HD webcam to your computer and video chat with Skype, Windows Messenger or your favorite instant messaging application. Adjustable Mount and Save Space Get up and running immediately without having to bother about installing any drivers. An integrated mounting clip gives you the freedom to position the camera wherever it works best - on the LCD screen, notebook or on the table. Automatic Low-light Correction Stream clear video, even in dim light. Video automatically adjusts to accommodate shadowy or harsh lighting conditions. DRC Digital Wide Dynamic Even in dim light， shadowy or harsh lighting conditions，you will get the best image and stream clear video.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great 1080p webcam for the price, just make sure everything is included
reviews.reviewText: This is the 2nd one I purchased after being very satisfied with the 1st one. I was looking for a good 1080p webcam that isn't expensive and now that most people are working from home, a webcam is necessary. Easy to install, just unbox, mount it where you want on top of your monitor or use the tripod with 3 adjustable arms and plug it into an available USB-A port.The 1st one I purchased arrived without the tripod and when I plugged it into 2 Windows 10 desktops and a Windows 10 laptop, it was not recognized in any of the computers. It did however come with the privacy cover. I contacted Amazon and they shipped another one immediately. The replacement worked straight out of the box and came with the tripod and privacy cover. Appreciate the support from Amazon. I have been using it for months and confirmed it works with all applications and the quality is amazing.Ordered this 2nd one Monday, 1/11 and received it Tuesday, 1/12. Worked straight out of the box and included everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money
reviews.reviewText: I got the camera faster than expected, and I was very pleasantly surprised with both image and sound quality. It can easily stream at 30 fps (if the computer can accept it). Unlike my Logitech C310, it does not produce error messages in OpenCV; I was very happy with that too. Sound worked fine under Windows 10, but couldn't get it to work under Linux (Kubuntu 18.04), but since I got it for video only, I didn't spend any time trouble shooting it there. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is that the camera doesn't indicate when it is actually sending video over the USB - the indicator LED is only indicating power - not video streaming. I consider that a privacy risk - I want to know when the camera is recording when I look at it. Another thing that would improve the number of uses would be a tripod thread (1/4" x 20) in its multi function bracket. Since this bracket has a metal core, I could easily cut one in myself, and I am showing two of the use cases this would enable. At any rate, if this camera had a "video on" indicator LED instead of a power on LED, I would recommend it without any hesitation to everybody.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Buena imagen y se ve muy claro

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow amazing, great quality!!

I am amazed with this camera the quality is hd, very convenient and so easy to set up, the picture was so clear when I used it, to video call my friend living in the abroad!! And also it comes with the manual.. very good product and quality , the price was so cheap for this good quality camera!! And you won’t regret buying these items!! I recommend this product for you guys to give it a try!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good cam. Mic - not so much.
reviews.reviewText: Bought an Amazon open box special in a pinch. At this particular time it has been difficult to find a low cost webcam that could be had within a few days and this fit the bill - sort of. It was supposedly check and certified by Amazon as a working unit. With all of the video conferencing happening I needed a cam and mic for my office desktop and found this. Cam quality is acceptably good but the mic is distant. I have gone thru all of the comp and app settings and have everything maxed out. It's not worth the time and effort to return this cam so I will probably give it to my son to use for streaming, etc where he uses a dedicated audio headset. I will be looking once again for another cam to cover my own needs- probably one from a Logical brand that I have found through past purchases to be great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great webcam, no driver installation required
reviews.reviewText: I really like my webcam and have only had it on for about an hour. I could not figure out how to install it because when I plugged it in I got nothing. Well after trial and error with looking into installing drivers, etc., I realized I only needed to click on camera in my start up and it started to work. TIP: Do not pay for and install drivers. It was so simple. The quality is great, the sound is great and it was easy. I love it so far. Get investment for me and I am a first time user of webcams. The picture quality is better than my laptop. I can also connect it to my laptop and my desktop. I think I need a second one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and affordable
reviews.reviewText: I love this camera I use it for school when I have to take exams, the only thing that it needs is for a higher stand and a better camera focus sometimes I have to show my ID on camera and it can't really focus on it making it hard for my proctoring exam to start.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture quality for the value
reviews.reviewText: I purchased based on another reviewer's reco. She had been using it for 3 yrs for Google Meetings. I've used it for a week now. The picture quality is great for the price. I prefer that my image be closer in, tighter, rather than the wide room angle so this Deri Cam is perfect. Sound quality in the built in mic is just okay. Set up is easy. Plug in, find your camera feature on your laptop or desktop so that it recognizes the webcam and you're done. The fact that you have a cord visible from the camera to the desktop is ugly to look at but for the price and ease of set up it's fine.
This item is not as shown in the website. Quality is very poor.
